title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is 2, it is even, so the radicand must be greater than or equal to 0.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Add 4 to both sides of the inequality.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Divide both sides of the inequality by 3. Then we get x is greater than equal to $$\frac{4}{3}$$. We can write it in interval notation $$[\frac{4}{3},\infty)$$.
